Description: Painted plaster portrait-head of young man; repaired and restored.
Curator's comments: Published: S. Walker and M. Bierbrier, Fayum. Misteriosi volti dall'Egitto, London 1997, p. 154 [114]. Being studied by Ahmed Derbala in view of publication
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces
